attributes.action: STOP GRIMSBY TOWN HALL BEING CLEANED AGAIN WITH TAX PAYERS MONEY.
attributes.additional_details: WE WILL COME OUT AND STAND FOR OUR RIGHTS!!!!
attributes.background: THE COUNCIL ARE YET AGAIN SPENDING COUNCIL MONEY ON UNESSESARY WORK, THERE ARE MORE THINGS NEEDED DOING IN OUR TOWN , THE TOWN HALL IS NOT A PRIORITY, AND WE THE TAX PAYERS REQUIRE A SAY IN WHAT THE PRIORITIES ARE.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them.
 
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
